short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the Twitch video to pause.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch is the only popular video player where you can't click on the video to play/pause the stream. No more! "Click to Pause for Twitch" adds the simple functionally of toggling the play/pause state by clicking on it. Don't worry: double-click to toggle fullscreen still works too.
